attributes.action: To acknowledge that these electronic petition's are of no consequence whatsoever.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No notice is ever taken of these petitions and they are of no use what so ever other than to give the appearance of free speech and to identify people that are a possible threat to the goverments agenda.

rejection.details: Please send comments on e-petitions to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
